div1.p: Rath hopes that General Grant can join them for lunch on Monday, February 25.

Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
Sorry that you were still confused about our en-
gagement on Monday February 25. General Grant is
trying to arrange to have lunch with us on that day. If
he cannot, perhaps you and I after lunch can meet him
in his office here for a time. Please check with me at
NAtional 2215 on Monday morning.
We are looking forward to meeting you.
